titleStmt.title: A reply to the answer of Anonymus to Doctor Gauden's Analysis of the sense of the covenant: and under that, to a later tract of one Mr Zach. Crofton of the same fraternity with him. By John Rowland Oxoniensis, CCC. Rector of Footscray in Kent.
titleStmt.author: Rowland, John, 1606-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for T.J. and are to be sold at Westminster-Hall, and the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
A reply to: Gauden, John. Analysis.
